details.name: Hisn al-Muslim
details.chapter: Of the guest for the host

data.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ بارِكْ لَهُمْ فيما رَزَقْـتَهُم، وَاغْفِـرْ لَهُـمْ وَارْحَمْهُمْ
data.meaning: O Allah, bless them in what You have provided for them, and forgive them and have mercy on them.
data.transliteration:
Allāhumma bārik lahum fī mā razaqtahum,
wagh’fir lahum warḥamhum.
